types.html:
mousseur m (plural mousseurs)

  1. (cooking) a tool or accessory used to froth milk and other liquids
  2. a fitting on a tap that ensures a straight and evenly pressured stream of water; a tap aerator
    Synonyms: aerator, brise-jet
  3. (chemistry, mining) a substance used to create froth
trans: a tool or accessory used to froth milk and other liquids
a fitting on a tap that ensures a straight and evenly pressured stream of water
a substance used to create froth
